mapper.select: select f.fid, f.name, f.lat, f.lng, f.fcontent, f.mainimage from (select fid, name, lat, lng, fcontent, mainimage from festival where type like '%'||#{type}||'%' and place like '%'||#{place}||'%' and fid = ( select fid from festadate where to_char(opendate, 'mm') like '%'||#{month}||'%') order by fid desc ) f where ROWNUM >= #{startRow} and ROWNUM <= #{size};
select count(*) from festival where type like '%'||#{type}||'%' and place like '%'||#{place}||'%' and fid = ( select fid from festadate where to_char(opendate, 'mm') like '%'||#{month}||'%' )
